ants.precautions: Use borax-based baits. Keep food sealed. Seal entry points.

bees.precautions: Contact a beekeeper for safe removal. Avoid disturbing the hive.

beetle.precautions: Use neem oil or insecticidal soap. Remove infected plants.

catterpillar.precautions: Handpick if possible. Use BT (Bacillus thuringiensis) spray.

earthworms.precautions: Generally beneficial. No action needed unless overpopulation occurs.

earwig.precautions: Use rolled newspaper traps. Reduce moisture in the area.

grasshopper.precautions: Use floating row covers. Apply neem oil or garlic spray.

moth.precautions: Use pheromone traps. Store food in airtight containers.

slug.precautions: Use beer traps. Apply diatomaceous earth around plants.

snail.precautions: Handpick in evening. Create copper tape barriers.

wasp.precautions: Use wasp traps. Seal garbage cans. Avoid bright colors in garden.

weevil.precautions: Freeze grains to kill eggs. Use airtight storage containers.
